The Copper Arm

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 345
national discount [nationrebate]: #49 MA Ulm - Forges of Ulm
(unremovable [cursed])

Requires 15E5F to forge (E3F1)

The smiths of Ulm have always dreamed of holding more hammers in their hands. This elaborate copper arm which attaches to the ribs is the result of their labors.
